channel.title: Wonder & Welcome
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast about parenting and following Jesus.
channel.itunes:author: Seth Hein, Shannon Hein
channel.itunes:summary: Parenting is hard! We know, we've been in the middle of it for over a decade. And we have needed a lot of help and encouragement along the way. That's why we wanted to create the Wonder & Welcome podcast. We've received so much help and support, we want to share some of that with you. We'd always appreciate your feedback and you can get in touch with us on email and or on instagram!
channel.description: Parenting is hard! We know, we've been in the middle of it for over a decade. And we have needed a lot of help and encouragement along the way. That's why we wanted to create the Wonder & Welcome podcast. We've received so much help and support, we want to share some of that with you. We'd always appreciate your feedback and you can get in touch with us on email and or on instagram!

item.title: 1: Encouragers and Squashers
item.itunes:author: Seth Hein, Shannon Hein
item.itunes:subtitle: Wonder & Welcome: 1: Encouragers and Squashers
item.itunes:summary: Seth and Shannon make introductions, explain the meaning behind the name Wonder & Welcome, and share stories of encouraging and squashing wonder and welcome.
item.description: Seth and Shannon make introductions, explain the meaning behind the name Wonder & Welcome, and share stories of encouraging and squashing wonder and welcome. Show Notes Available at http://localhost:4000/wonder-and-welcome-podcast/2023/episode-001.html.
